mapper.select: SELECT M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET FROM BUDGET where DEPT_CODE= #{deptCode} and WORKPLACE_CODE= #{workplaceCode} and ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO in (select to_number(#{accountPeriodNo})-1 from BUDGET) and ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE= #{accountInnerCode} and BUDGETING_CODE= 1

SELECT M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET FROM BUDGET where DEPT_CODE= #{deptCode} and WORKPLACE_CODE= #{workplaceCode} and ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO = #{accountPeriodNo} and ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE= #{accountInnerCode} and BUDGETING_CODE= 2
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BUDGET ( BUDGET_CODE, DEPT_CODE, BUDGETING_CODE, WORKPLACE_CODE, ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO, M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET ) VALUES ( #{budgetCode}, #{deptCode}, #{budgetingCode}, #{workplaceCode}, #{accountPeriodNo}, #{m1Budget}, #{m2Budget}, #{m3Budget}, #{m4Budget}, #{m5Budget}, #{m6Budget}, #{m7Budget}, #{m8Budget}, #{m9Budget}, #{m10Budget}, #{m11Budget}, #{m12Budget}
)

INSERT INTO BUDGET ( DEPT_CODE, WORKPLACE_CODE, ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO, BUDGETING_CODE, M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET ) VALUES ( #{deptCode}, #{workplaceCode}, #{accountInnerCode}, #{accountPeriodNo}, #{budgetingCode}, #{m1Budget}, #{m2Budget}, #{m3Budget}, #{m4Budget}, #{m5Budget}, #{m6Budget}, #{m7Budget}, #{m8Budget}, #{m9Budget}, #{m10Budget}, #{m11Budget}, #{m12Budget}
)
mapper.update: update BUDGET set M1_BUDGET = #{m1Budget}, M2_BUDGET = #{m2Budget}, M3_BUDGET = #{m3Budget}, M4_BUDGET = #{m4Budget}, M5_BUDGET = #{m5Budget}, M6_BUDGET = #{m6Budget}, M7_BUDGET = #{m7Budget}, M8_BUDGET = #{m8Budget}, M9_BUDGET = #{m9Budget}, M10_BUDGET = #{m10Budget}, M11_BUDGET = #{m11Budget}, M12_BUDGET = #{m12Budget} WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode} AND ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountInnerCode} AND ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO = #{accountPeriodNo} AND BUDGETING_CODE = #{budgetingCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET
FROM BUDGET where DEPT_CODE= #{deptCode} and WORKPLACE_CODE= #{workplaceCode} and ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE= #{accountInnerCode} and ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO= #{accountPeriodNo} and BUDGETING_CODE= 1

{call BUDGET_COMPARISON( #{accountPeriodNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountInnerCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workplaceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RESULT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, mode=OUT, resultMap=comparisonBudgetBeanResult})}

SELECT M1_BUDGET, M2_BUDGET, M3_BUDGET, M4_BUDGET, M5_BUDGET, M6_BUDGET, M7_BUDGET, M8_BUDGET, M9_BUDGET, M10_BUDGET, M11_BUDGET, M12_BUDGET FROM BUDGET where DEPT_CODE= #{deptCode} and WORKPLACE_CODE= #{workplaceCode} and ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO in (select to_number(#{accountPeriodNo}) from BUDGET) and ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE= #{accountInnerCode} and BUDGETING_CODE= 1
